column4: why do people add underscores to their names? Serious question...
many IRC programs try 'yourchoicenick' first, and 'yourchoicenick_' second if the first is already in use.
I think $$ is the standard way to get the PID
Thanks, but $$ is the PID of the currently executing shell. The more I read about $! the more I'm convinced I'm doing something wrong :-) it looks like exactly what I want.
